headline: Amcor completes previously announced sale of BCNA joint venture interest for $122 million; Proceeds used to reduce debt
summary: Amcor (NYSE: AMCR, ASX: AMC), a global leader in developing and producing responsible packaging solutions, announced today it completed the sale of its 50% interest in Bericap North America (BCNA) for $122 million on December 27, with the proceeds used to reduce debt.
